trans-unit.source: Specifies the locations within the configuration-file hierarchy that can set or override the properties contained within a <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> object.
The values in this enumeration are optionally used when creating a new instance of the <xref:System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection> class.
Note this enumeration applies to client applications only.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined only in the Machine.config file.
The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined either in the Machine.config file or in the Exe.config file in the client application directory.

The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined in the Machine.config file, in the Exe.config file in the client application directory, in the User.config file in the roaming user directory, or in the User.config file in the local user directory.

The <xref href="System.Configuration.ConfigurationSection"></xref> can be defined in the Machine.config file, in the Exe.config file in the client application directory, or in the User.config file in the roaming user directory.
